CustomField.formula: CASE(Sales_Office__c, "Amsterdam", "EMEA", "London", "EMEA", "Dubai", "EMEA", "Boston", "US", "San Mateo", "US", "San Carlos", "US", "Melbourne", "APAC", IF( ISPICKVAL(Owner.Work_Location__c, "Remote") && CASESAFEID(Owner.Id) = "0050P000007V4NTQA0", /* Exception for Ben Miller */ "US", "" ) )
CustomField.label: Sales Office Grouped
